mlr3viz v0.2.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog
  • mlr3book

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

mlr3viz 0.2.0 Unreleased

  • Added plots for TaskDens and TaskSurv from package mlr3proba.
  • Added experimental plots for LearnerClassifRpart and LearnerRegrRpart.
  • Update documentation of PredictionRegr (#23)
  • autoplot.BenchmarkResult(): Support for learners with identical IDs (#19)

mlr3viz 0.1.1 2020-02-19

  • New plot: learner prediction for objects of class ResampleResult. Additionally, the helper function plot_learner_prediction() first performs a resample() and then plots the result.
  • New plot: residual plot for objects of class PredictionRegr.

mlr3viz 0.1.0 2020-01-08

  • Initial CRAN release

Contents

Developed by Michel Lang, Patrick Schratz, Raphael Sonabend.
